Staff are working remotely, and will respond to email.  Please send any questions to your advisor or to hcollege@uic.edu.   COVID-19 Updates and Resources          UIC Honors Student selected for a Gates-Cambridge Scholarship    Posted on April 17, 2020                  Anis Barmada, a UIC Honors College senior majoring in biological sciences and chemistry in the College of Liberal Arts and Sciences, was selected for a Gates-Cambridge Scholarship, a highly competitive selection award which emphasizes outstanding academic achievement and social leadership.  He will pursue a masterâ€™s degree in genomic medicine at the School of Clinical Medicine at Cambridge. --  Adapted from an April 15, 2020 post in UIC Today      Modified on April 17, 2020
